Module: userïƒ

This module is used to query data about unprivileged accounts.

General usage:

ğŸ¦ > user <submodule>[=enabled]

Results can be exported to a csv file using the keyword â€œexportâ€ at the end of the command:

ğŸ¦ > user <submodule> export

A csv file will be generated in â€œexportsâ€ directory.

user readlapsïƒ

This submodule finds if any unprivileged user can read LAPS passwords.

ğŸ¦ > user readlaps

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > user readlaps=enabled

user passwordneverexpiresïƒ

This submodule finds all unprivileged users with a password that never expires.

ğŸ¦ > user passwordneverexpires

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > user passwordneverexpires=enabled

user localadminïƒ

This submodule finds all unprivileged users with local admin rights on computers.

ğŸ¦ > user localadmin

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > user localadmin=enabled

user localadminDCïƒ

This submodule finds all unprivileged users with local admin rights on domain controllers.

ğŸ¦ > user localadminDC

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > user localadminDC=enabled
